description:
This talk summarizes a number of efforts across the community to build standardization into the ecosystem. We include topics like accelerator hardware (GPUs, TPUs, multi-core CPUs), API extension points in NumPy and Pandas, file formats, and other community efforts to establish cohesion.
See the full SciPy 2019 playlist at https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYx7XA2nY5GcDQblpQ_M1V3PQPoLWiDAC

title: Refactoring the SciPy Ecosystem for Heterogeneous Computing
